source.fd5ba4b1:
result = DATA.pipe(
    op.reduce(lambda accData, x: accData + [x], seed=[])
).run()

print(result)
source.d174ef82:
DATA.pipe(
    op.reduce(lambda accData, x: accData + [x], seed=[])
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda value:print("result =",value),
    on_error = lambda error : print("error =",error),
    on_completed = lambda :print("completed")
)
